channel.title: Gunz The Last Duel (Original Ijji Replica with enhanced Features)
channel.description:
[size=24pt]OK first off if this is not allowed in this section i am sorry, i didnt know which section i could post this in this is my latest development project with a good friend who owns it since i moved away from RSPS. Please move to correct section if this is an issue.[/size]
Hello Gunz fans! Tired of overpowered, unoriginal, easy and unchallenging game play from private servers? Join us on this fully original, official, lead style GunZ platform. Everything is unedited and is as tough as you remember! We encourage old fans to return and challenge new gamers to embrace and engage our dynamic environment!
GunZ: The Last Duel, or just GunZ for short, is a 3D MMO Shooter with a third person camera angle. GunZ is hands down the fastest paced MMO Shooter out there with astrong emphasis on both swordplay and guns. Run on walls, deflect bullets with your sword and perform other gravity defying action moves while trying to destroy yourenemy! That’s the premise of GunZ, straight up fast paced action. [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/29pz2bl.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/2hoy449.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/dnyemv.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/a5j96p.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/11id56e.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/wr13mc.jpg[/img] Publisher: Monk Entertainment, INC
Playerbase: High Graphics: Medium Quality Type: MMO/RPG EXP Rate: Default PvP: Yes PvM: Yes Filesize: 384.55 MB
Pros: +Multiple game modes, +Unique gameplay, +Huge playerbase, +Plenty of different weapons and armor in the store, +Fair selection of playable maps Cons: -Laggy players glitch the game, -Difficult to master fancy swordplay, -Cash items can imbalance the game GunZ: The Duel is an incredibly fast paced third person MMO Shooter. It was one of the first successful MMO Shooters and today boasts over 5000 concurrent users at almost any given time. Because of the game’s large playerbase, it’s never hard to find a game to join. Run on walls, shoot rockets and blast away your enemies in this incredibly addictive shooter. Play online with up to 16 players at once in 8 different game modes. Earn money, or ‘bounty’, by doing well against other player and use it to purchase new weapons and armor from the game’s store. [size=14pt][font=trebuchet ms]join us at : gunzduels.com[/font][/size] [url=http://gunzduels.com]gunzduels.com[/url] [center][size=18pt]Find me ingame. "Twist3d"[/size][/center]
[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=gpwvuZcVDU0[/youtube]

Time goes fast. (If you get what I was saying)
Good luck at getting more players with you I guess I’ll play even though
I will suck

EDIT: I’ve never played gunz because I thought it would be too hard and I was never really good at/ liked 3rd person shooters but I like this a lot :D[/quote]

Thanks bro, welcome to our community. Practice makes perfect.

item.dc:creator: @Motekiku Motekiku
item.description:
@Motekiku wrote:

MAIETGames:

Ohh man, brings back memories seems like the only original one out. First thing I join this and find this you’re awesome I’ll definetly give it a go! Gotta help me get my skills back though. Cheers

LOL, GunZ was made by MAIET. Is it coincidence you have it as a username?

Read full topic

Hello Gunz fans! Tired of overpowered, unoriginal, easy and unchallenging game play from private servers? Join us on this fully original, official, lead style GunZ
platform. Everything is unedited and is as tough as you remember! We encourage old fans to return and challenge new gamers to embrace and engage our dynamic
environment!

GunZ: The Last Duel, or just GunZ for short, is a 3D MMO Shooter with a third person camera angle. GunZ is hands down the fastest paced MMO Shooter out there with astrong emphasis on both swordplay and guns. Run on walls, deflect bullets with your sword and perform other gravity defying action moves while trying to destroy yourenemy! That’s the premise of GunZ, straight up fast paced action.

GunZ: The Duel is an incredibly fast paced third person MMO Shooter. It was one of the first successful MMO Shooters and today boasts over 5000 concurrent users at

incredibly addictive shooter. Play online with up to 16 players at once in 8 different game modes. Earn money, or ‘bounty’, by doing well against other player and use
